changedFiles.description: Removed unused 'executing atomic.Bool' field from intervalState struct. Resolves staticcheck warning U1001.
Promise/A+ implementation with fix for unhandled rejection false positive bug. Changed checkUnhandledRejections() to move cleanup after handler existence check.
New test file covering 3 interval race conditions: wrapper field access race, duplicate currentLoopTimerID assignment, test-level intervalID race.
First iteration review document for Promise unhandled rejection false positive fix. Verdict: CORRECT.
Second iteration re-review document for Promise fix. Verdict: STILL CORRECT - NO ISSUES FOUND. Mathematical proof of correctness established.
Comprehensive coverage gap analysis identifying 67 uncovered functions, 7 critical gaps, estimated gain of +36-42% coverage.
Structured JSON tracking all coverage gaps by package and function.
CHANGE_GROUP_B review document re-verifying goja-eventloop against main branch for regressions.
First iteration review of Eventloop Core & Timer ID System. No critical bugs found. Documented 2 acceptable behaviors.
Re-review for perfection of Eventloop Core. Verdict: STILL CORRECT - NO ISSUES FOUND.
Complete project blueprint documenting all tasks, logical chunks, review cycles, coverage targets, and continuous verification tasks.
Comprehensive git state analysis documenting current changes, risk assessment, and immediate action items.
Partial git reality analysis (70% complete - missing main branch diff).
Main event loop implementation with timer pool, fast path mode, metrics, and microtask support. 1699 lines.
alternatethree implementation (experiment selected in tournament). Weak pointer registry.
alternateone implementation (chained microtask list design). Tournament participant.
GojaEventLoop adapter with Promise combinators (all, race, allSettled, any), Timer API bindings, JS float64 encoding for timer IDs.

logicalGroups.name: CRITICAL: Promise Unhandled Rejection False Positive Fix
logicalGroups.risk: LOW - VERIFIED CORRECT after two comprehensive review iterations
logicalGroups.description: Fixed critical bug where checkUnhandledRejections() deleted promiseHandlers entries BEFORE checking for handler existence, causing ALL rejections to be reported as unhandled (false positives). Fix verified CORRECT via mathematical proof and comprehensive testing (200+ tests, race detector clean). Discovered and fixed 3 pre-existing interval race conditions during verification.

logicalGroups.name: CRITICAL: Goja Integration Re-verification (CHANGE_GROUP_B)
logicalGroups.risk: MEDIUM - Reviewing for regressions from CHANGE_GROUP_A changes
logicalGroups.description: Re-verification of historically completed goja-eventloop work to ensure no regressions from Promise bug fix changes. All 3 critical bugs fixed historically (double-wrapping, memory leak, Promise.reject semantics). 18/18 tests passing. Coverage: 74.9%.

logicalGroups.name: INFRASTRUCTURAL: Test Coverage & Analysis
logicalGroups.description: Comprehensive coverage analysis identifying 7 critical gaps (Promise combinators, JS integration, error paths, state machine queries, FD registration, alternatethree core, registry scavenge). Estimated gain: +36-42% coverage. Current coverage: 77.5% main, 69.3% alternateone, 57.7% alternatethree, 72.7% alternatetwo.

logicalGroups.name: IMPLEMENTATION: Eventloop Core System
logicalGroups.description: Complete eventloop implementation with timer pool management, Promise/A+ support, JS adapter, metrics collection, and platform-specific poller implementations (kqueue/epoll/IOCP). All critical bugs fixed (Timer ID MAX_SAFE_INTEGER, Promise unhandled rejection, fast path starvation). Coverage: 77.5% main, needs 90%+.

logicalGroups.name: IMPLEMENTATION: Goja EventLoop Adapter
logicalGroups.risk: LOW - All tests passing (18/18), historically reviewed
logicalGroups.description: GojaEventLoop adapter providing JavaScript timer APIs (setTimeout, setInterval, setImmediate) and Promise combinators (all, race, allSettled, any). All 3 critical bugs fixed historically. Coverage: 74.9%, needs 90%+.

logicalGroups.name: VERIFICATION: Eventloop Core Review Cycle (LOGICAL_2)
logicalGroups.description: Two-iteration review cycle of Eventloop Core & Timer ID System. First iteration found 0 critical bugs, 2 documented acceptable behaviors. Re-review confirmed no issues. Verdict: PRODUCTION READY WITH ACCEPTABLE TRADE-OFFS.

logicalGroups.name: EXPERIMENTAL: Alternate Implementations (Tournament Results)
logicalGroups.description: Three alternate eventloop implementations evaluated in tournament: alternateone (chained microtask list), alternatetwo (hybrid microtask/arena), alternatethree (weak pointer registry). alternatethree selected for production (winning tournament). Comprehensive benchmarking and GC pressure analysis completed.

logicalGroups.name: DOCUMENTATION: Project Tracking & Blueprinting
logicalGroups.description: Complete project blueprint defining all tasks, logical chunks, review cycles, coverage targets, betteralign tasks, and continuous verification tasks. Work-in-progress diary tracking current state and next actions.

logicalGroups.name: MAINTENANCE: Dependency Updates & Go Version
logicalGroups.description: Updated Go version from 1.25.1 to 1.25.6 across workspace. Updated golang.org/x/exp dependency. Updated golang.org/x/tools from 0.40.0 to 0.41.0. Updated catrate dependency.

gojaEventloopModule.confidence: HIGH - Historically reviewed, CHANGE_GROUP_B re-verification in progress

RESUME COVERAGE_1.3: Add tests for alternatethree Promise Core and error paths (+20-25% coverage)
RESUME COVERAGE_1.4: Verify 90%+ coverage achieved for all eventloop packages
RESUME COVERAGE_2: Improve goja-eventloop coverage to 90%+
CONTINUOUS: Run make-all-with-log after every milestone
